Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-6104 affecting package prometheus for versions less than 2.37.0-14
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-6104 affecting package prometheus for versions less than 2.37.0-14. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package prometheus is earlier than 2.37.0-14, affected by CVE-2024-6104
